name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BMW M4 City Ride Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the thrill of a BMW M4 cruising through the city with this sleek, high-speed live wallpaper! 🏙️🚗💨

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab into a dynamic, urban nightscape as the powerful BMW M4 takes you on a stylish ride through the city streets. This live wallpaper brings the elegance and raw energy of BMW to your browser, making it perfect for car enthusiasts and those who appreciate the blend of luxury and performance. With practical features and a polished design, this extension makes each tab feel like an exhilarating drive.

Key Features
🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Watch the BMW M4 in motion against a cityscape background, adding a touch of excitement to your tab.
🔗 Customizable Site Shortcuts: Easily access your favorite sites with editable shortcuts.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Conveniently search the web without leaving your BMW-themed tab.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Stay on schedule with a stylish clock and date feature.
🔗 Quick Access Links: Manage the extension effortlessly with "Remove Extension" and "More Extensions" links in the lower left corner.
Take the BMW M4's power and elegance with you every time you browse. This extension offers an engaging experience, combining luxury car visuals with essential tools to fuel your drive through the web.

Keywords: BMW M4 Live Wallpaper, City Ride Chrome Extension, Luxury Car Wallpaper, BMW Cityscape Tab, High-Speed BMW Background, BMW M4 Theme Chrome, City Lights Live Wallpaper, BMW Chrome Extension, Sports Car New Tab, BMW M4 Chrome Theme
